properties.title: Britanniahütte SAC
properties.description: Mountain guesthouse, mountain hiker cabin and accommodation for high mountain tours in the environs of Saas-Fee. Britanniahütte is one of the most visited and largest SAC cabins, located at the foot of Allalinhorn. Starting point for the Valais Haute Route as well as mixed tours and climbing adventures.  Hikers and one-day visitors can enjoy the view of the high summits including Mischabel, Weissmies and across the glaciers to Strahlhorn. There is a new high alpine hiking trail to the Mattmark reservoir.   In the spring season when the hut is guarded, a winter hiking trail is prepared on the Felskinn Egginerjoch-Britannia hut route (in case of good conditions).
